text: Survey component that can be embeded locally
I'm working with PHP and need to add a survey component.
I would prefer something that allows me to embed the survey on the site.
The creation of the survey itself can be off-site, no problem there, as long as the users themselves don't have to go elsewhere to answer the survey.
Does something like this already exist?
There's another issue: some of the surveys may be closed surveys i.e.
sent to a specific group of emails and only those can answer it.
So I'm guessing the user will have to click a link which has his email and code coded as parameters.
Any other ways to do the same thing that I may be missing?
I'm open to all suggestions... but would really prefer not to have to install an entire open source system for this, unless all else fails.
